title: 15  Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Smokestacks, 1930
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">15  
Designed by Sergi Petrovich Burylin (Russian, 1876–1942)  
Manufactured by Kokhma Textile Mill (Russia)  
Smokestacks   
1930  
Cotton, plain weave; open work; screen-printed; 11.4 × 11.9 cm (4 1/2 × 4 3/4 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.34

</section><section id="figures">Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Smokestacks, 1930.
